DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The aim study evaluate FES effect erectile function men erectile dysfunction . Expected Results : The hypothesis treatment FES decrease erectile dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Functional Electrical Stimulation Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Erectile dysfunction ( ED ) affect approximately 150 million men worldwide . The application functional electrical stimulation ( FES ) use due high regenerative capacity smooth muscle cell . This approach beneficial treatment usually ultimate cause cavernous smooth muscle degeneration . Objective : The aim study evaluate FES effect erectile function men erectile dysfunction . Methods : Randomized Clinical Trial select 30 patient erectile dysfunction . The men include randomize two group . The intervention group conduct therapy FES ( 50Hz / 500us ) 15 minute intensity motor threshold control group use FES placebo . Two session hold weekly four week . Erectile function assess use validated questionnaire IIEF-5 . The instrument complete blind researcher technique randomize treatment do randomly . Expected Results : The hypothesis treatment FES decrease erectile dysfunction .
DOC.criteria: Male patient 40 65 year age , stable marital relationship ( 6 month ) Diagnosis erectile dysfunction ( score less 22 IIEF5 ) Clinical history ED least 6 month A neurogenic ( spinal cord injury , Parkinson 's , MS , post prostatectomy ) Hypogonadism ( total testosterone < 300 ng / dl ) Patient reporting use inhibitor 5PDE FIC last 60 day Diagnosis coronary artery disease / cerebrovascular disease Impossibility understanding goal , technical study inform consent cognitive impairment
